Tamàs Nàray

From fashion designer to succesful painter

Here's a time line of Tamas Naray:

  • 1977-1981 French-German bsc, than started working at ARTEX
  • 1981 French-German bsc, than started working at ARTEX
  • 1983Postgrad degree in Accounting
  • 1986 He graduated as an industrial designer in 1986, and his examination was awarded a special prize and a scholarship to France at a premiere in London.
  • 1989 Finished studying fashion design in Paris
  • 2000 Ybl palace opens his own, than at main street of Budapest
    • Than he was working as a stylist in TV shows in Hungary, now he works as a painter, lives in Barcelona.

For more info about his current job find his personal page
